description: A comprehensive set of prompts and ideal responses for evaluating the Whoop AI Coach, categorized by difficulty and aligned with system prompt guidelines.

evaluation_framework_summary.objective: Systematically test and improve AI performance across common, medium, and edge-case user queries related to health data within Whoopâ€™s scope.
evaluation_framework_summary.persona_profile_used: Varied by case (e.g., Executive Alex, or as specified in persona_context_snapshot)
